title: Amazing blog post
subtitle: Can complexity be fun?
smallbody: Something to catch more attention for the reader to be interested in opening and reading this blog.
author: Awsome Studio

body.data: Here is some interesting text to go with the next image, but before you look at it, I need to tell you about some random junk that might interest you and add more value to that image, but that is more of an opinion and a guess of how you, the user will consume this information.
So, how was the image? Pretty "Placeholder-like" right?

items: And i'm the last list item here
